item.title: Deploying OpenFaaS on Digital Ocean with Terraform
item.description: We are going to look at how to use Terraform to deploy a Kubernetes cluster on Digital Ocean, add a managed postgres database, and redis and OpenFaaS in kubernetes. This will show how to use Terraform to manage the configuration and how we can access both cloud and kubernetes managed services from OpenFaaS functions. We are going to use the digitalocean, kubernetes, and helm terraform providers. The plan Provision a digitalocean_kubernetes_cluster Provision a digitalocean_database_cluster Provision 2 kubernetes_namespace for openfaas and openfaas-fn Provision a helm_release for openfaas Provision a helm_release for redis Provision 2 kubernetes_secret to point to the databases Deploy an OpenFaaS function that reads those secrets and talks to the database.
